alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Caldwell; Grant; Jackson; La Salle; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:44AM CDT until June 26 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Caldwell Parish in north central Louisiana... Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... North central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern La Salle Parish in north central Louisiana... Southwestern Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 744 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Brownsville-Bawcomville to 15 miles northwest of Clarks to 6 miles northwest of Winnfield, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winnfield, Jonesboro, Columbia, Olla, Clarks, Grayson, Urania, Chatham, Goldonna, Tullos, Dodson, Georgetown, Calvin, Eros, Sikes, Vixen, Riverton, Standard, Joyce and Burlington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Caldwell; Grant; Jackson; La Salle; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn
